milestones.description: From the land of Jakarta - 20 motorcycle taxis, 1 call center, and a mission to remove friction from people’s lives. Gojek (then GO-JEK) begins to paint the town green.
Enter the Gojek app. Orders explode from 3,000 to 100,000 a day. Operations expand beyond Jakarta. Enter food delivery, ticket bookings, and more. Series A funding flows in.
Gojek becomes Indonesia’s first unicorn. Orders jump to 300,000 a day.
Ranks 17th among Fortune’s Top 20 companies that changed the world. Clocks 3,600x growth in 18 months. That’s one of the fastest in the world.
Spreads wings across Vietnam and Thailand. We’re now talking 100 million orders a day. Grows 1,100x in total volume of transaction.
Listed Fortune’s favorite again! Over 20 products, 2 million driver partners. Series F funding from Google, Tencent, JD.com and Mitsubishi.

Integrates Indonesia, Singapore, Thailand and Vietnam apps into one, under Gojek. GoFood becomes the world's most helpful and user-friendly app during the pandemic.* Crosses 190 million app downloads.
Gojek and Tokopedia unite to form GoTo, the largest tech group in Indonesia and the “go to” ecosystem for daily life.

cultures.title: We do what's best for all of GoTo
cultures.description: We're performance-driven and accountable in not just one but all aspects of the business.

cultures.title: We treat people with respect
cultures.description: We treat people with respect, and we show this by being open to different perspectives, transparent with opportunities and challenges.

cultures.title: We aim high, responsibly
cultures.description: We execute with excellence and efficiency, pursuing innovations, by adhering to the highest standards of ethics and integrity.

teams.name: Nadiem Makarim
teams.description: Nadiem is the visionary behind Gojek, leading its growth from a small call center to a multi-service platform.

teams.name: Kevin Aluwi
teams.description: Kevin has a strong background in finance and technology, playing a key role in Gojek's expansion and success.

teams.name: Andre Soelistyo
teams.description: Andre has extensive experience in investment banking and corporate finance, leading GoTo's strategic initiatives.

teams.name: Patrick Cao
teams.description: Patrick's expertise in finance and strategy has been instrumental in driving GoTo's growth and market presence.

teams.name: Catherine Hindra Sutjahyo
teams.role: Head of Food and Indonesia Sales & Ops
teams.description: Catherine has led various strategic initiatives at Gojek, focusing on expanding its food delivery services and operations.

teams.name: Nila Marita
teams.description: Nila brings a wealth of experience in corporate communications and public affairs to her role at Gojek.

teams.name: Monica Oudang
teams.description: Monica has a strong background in human resources, focusing on talent development and organizational growth at Gojek.

testimonials.name: Pipit
testimonials.description: After joining Gojek, I was able to support and provide for my family. I think Gojek is a company that can help a lot of people.

testimonials.name: Yusak Wiradi
testimonials.description: In the past, I had to send goods myself. Now GoBiz can help me in many ways.

testimonials.name: Rakha
testimonials.description: After 1-2 months of joining as a GoCar partner, thank God I can collect 5 million in cash.

testimonials.name: Iskandar
testimonials.description: In the past, our income for each outlet was tens of millions. Now, it has reached millions.

testimonials.name: Venty
testimonials.description: Since joining Gojek, our life as a family has gradually improved.

testimonials.name: Nita
testimonials.description: My favorite (feature) is the open and close restaurant setting as our customers are able to know we are closed every Tuesday.

testimonials.name: Andika
testimonials.description: When we give our best, the result is the best.

testimonials.name: Anindita
testimonials.description: Before using GoBiz, By Anind used the PO system. But since using the GoBiz application, customer can order from anywhere and anytime.

testimonials.name: Imam
testimonials.description: As a driver partner who is always on the move, I have to be ready and responsive under any circumstances.

testimonials.name: Deby Apriyanti
testimonials.description: The GoBiz application eases my business as it has various complete features.
